title: Bitcoin Spot ETFs Approval Partially Priced In, Coinbase Says
description: Spot-based ETFs are widely expected to unlock floodgates for mainstream money. Flows, however, are likely to materialise overtime, according to Coinbase.

title: Bitcoin Is Currently Neither ‘Bullish’ or ‘Bearish,’ Traders Say
description: Major tokens seemed to stabilize on Friday morning following a week-long price drop.

title: Defi Not a Risk to Financial Stability Yet, EU Securities Regulator Reports
description: Decentralized finance (defi) brings risks for investors but is yet to pose “meaningful risks” to financial stability, according to Europe’s securities watchdog. The agency believes, however, the phenomenon deserves attention in light of the EU’s new crypto rules as well as growing user base and has presented its assessment of the sector’s development. title: Genesis and FTX navigate through a $175M settlement amidst a sea of billion-dollar claims
description: In a pivotal moment for the cryptocurrency industry, a New York bankruptcy judge has sanctioned a settlement agreement between two beleaguered cryptocurrency firms, FTX and Genesis Global Trading (GGC). The settlement, which has been a subject of contention and scrutiny, involves a payment of $175 million from GGC to FTX-affiliated Alameda Research. This resolution comes ... Read more

title: Uniswap introduces closed beta of its android app
description: Uniswap advances its platform accessibility by launching a beta version of its Android app, enabling users to navigate various blockchain networks. Unveiling its new mobile application for Android users through a beta version, Uniswap expands its reach beyond its initial…

title: IOTA’s Firefly Team Unveils ‘Bloom’ – A Game-Changer for the Shimmer Ecosystem
description: Bloom is set to introduce groundbreaking features for the Shimmer ecosystem, reinforcing IOTA’s commitment to innovation. title: Is Friend.tech Really a Sustainable Platform?
description:
Although we’re in a bear market, the crypto space is constantly innovating. One of these recent innovations is Friend.tech. This Decentralized Application (dApp) was launched in August this year. And already, it’s got a ton of users on its platform. But, is this growth really sustainable? Before we answer this question, let us do a […]
